comments:

ASSERTION FAILED IN SystemReferencedObject: removeReference failed for org.eclipse.rse.internal.filters.SystemFilterPoolReference@159ac93 (referencedObjectName: szg-mober-d1___szg-mober-d1:dstore.files)
